recipe.title: White Beans with Squid, Arugula, and Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: 1 pound cleaned squid, bodies and tentacles separated
1 cup cooked white beans (see Cannellini Beans with Garlic and Sage ), drained, room temperature
instructions: Steam squid bodies and tentacles until tender, about 3 minutes. Transfer to plate and cool to lukewarm. Cut squid bodies into 1/2-inch-wide rings. Cut squid tentacles in half if large. Transfer squid to large bowl. Add baby arugula, cherry tomatoes, beans, olive oil, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice. Toss gently to blend, adding more lemon juice, if desired. Season with salt and pepper.
Steam squid bodies and tentacles until tender, about 3 minutes. Transfer to plate and cool to lukewarm.

Cut squid bodies into 1/2-inch-wide rings. Cut squid tentacles in half if large. Transfer squid to large bowl. Add baby arugula, cherry tomatoes, beans, olive oil, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice. Toss gently to blend, adding more lemon juice, if desired. Season with salt and pepper.
What to drink: Citrusy A Mano 2007 Soave ($9)
